titles.title: A bill to exempt persons with disabilities from the prohibition against providing section 8 rental assistance to college students.
A bill to exempt persons with disabilities from the prohibition against providing section 8 rental assistance to college students.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: Amends the Transportation, Treasury, Housing and Urban Development, the Judiciary, the District of Columbia, and Independent Agencies Appropriations Act, 2006, relating to the tenant-based rental assistance program, to exempt certain students with disabilities from the prohibition against providing Section 8 assistance to college students.
